about_the_game:
In 202X, a unified world government was established by simultaneous global default.

The following year, the government dismantled public institutions including police forces

in each country.

At the same time, a surveillance system with AI drones and AI surveillance cameras was

set up.

Prohibition of owning property, prohibition of armament, and protecting yourself by fighting.

These 3K law was enacted, and countries were plunged into chaos.

　

People relied on people with power, and a Gang Leader System was born at the school.

And it was the same with Mob All Megane Academy, at Riverside City where all MOBs

wear glasses.

The gang leader demanded a huge payment.

Students led by Aira, a black gal with a strong fighting spirit, formed the Black Gal Group.

The students of MOB joined to either the Gang Leader or the Black Gal group, and a war

broke out.

　

However, the Black Gal group was outnumbered by the Gang Leader group, whose strength

was overwhelming.

Aira was captured. The story begins with the remaining four members of the Black Gal group

They begin to carry out a rescue mission for Aira!

There are a total of 11 unique characters!

Each character has different HP, attack power, attack cycle, and attack reach.

The key to the game strategy is to choose the right character

for each stage and to protect your allies!

※This character does not appear in the trial version.

※This character does not appear in the trial version.

HP of players and allied NPCs recover when they pick up items dropped by enemies.

*Allied NPCs automatically pick up dropped items when their HP is low.

Yakisoba Bread

A stamina recovery item that is dropped when the enemy MOB boy, Sunglasses Boy, and Moa Bodyguard are defeated. The HP of the character who picks it up recovers 15.

Orange Juice

This item is dropped when an enemy MOB girl is defeated. The HP of the character who picks it up recovers 30.

The game progression consists of an Adventure Part and Action part with an action screen.

From Stage 2, a character selection screen appears in the beginging.

Action parts / How to control characters

  • Move up / W key

  • Move down / S key

  • Move right / D key

  • Move left / A key

  • Move upper right / W key + D key

  • Move upper left / W key + A key

  • Move lower right / S key + D key

  • Move lower left / S key + A key

  • MOB Punch / P key

  • Backhand blow / P key while MOB punching

  • Right roll attack / D key + P key

  • Left roll attack / A key + P key

  • Upper right roll attack / W key + D key + P key

  • Upper left roll attack / W key + A key + P key

  • Lower right roll attack / S key + D key + P key

  • Lower left roll attack / S key + A key + P key

  • Untie the rope (only when Aira is trapped in Stage 1) / P key near Aira

Action part / How to control screen

  • Stop in the middle of the Game or Instruction to Control / ESC key

  • Quit the game / After stopping the game, click the right or Yes to the message: Do you want to quit the game?

Adventure Part/ Instruction to Control the Screen

  • Display the message immediately / Left mouse click

  • Show next message / Left click when all messages are displayed

  • Finish adventure part / Left click on the SKIP button in the upper right corner

Select Character Screen / Instruction to Control the Screen

  • Select Character / Left-click on the character

  • Release Select Character / Left-click on the currently selected character

  • Finish Select Character / Left-click on the GO button in the upper right corner

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
